A C D G L M P R S T 

C

Client - Class in myChat
 
Client() - Constructor for class myChat.Client
Creates new form Client
ClientAble - Interface in myChat
interface which represents a client, client code is implementing this
ClientCode - Class in myChat
this class is the backend of the client GUI, all communication between the server and the client is managed here
ClientCode(String, int, JTextArea) - Constructor for class myChat.ClientCode
client code side regular constructor
ClientUpdater - Class in myChat
this class is a thread class which "listens" to the server to get all messages which users send through the chat
ClientUpdater(ObjectInputStream, JTextArea, Socket) - Constructor for class myChat.ClientUpdater
constructor thats sets all fields of this thread
close() - Method in class myChat.ClientCode
 
close() - Method in class myChat.ServerCode
close servers socket in case the server is shut down
Connect(String, MultiClientHandler) - Static method in class myChat.ServerCode
in case a client wants to connect, this method checks whether the name of client is in use, if not adds the thread which works with it to the vector and lets all clients know that new user is connected
connectMe(String) - Method in interface myChat.ClientAble
every client has to be able to connect the server
connectMe(String) - Method in class myChat.ClientCode
if we got an "event" of connection from GUI, we'll send the server a message which says " wants to connect"
CSMessage - Class in myChat
the form of messages that are transported from clietns to server and vice versa, every message contains a name field to identify the user who sent it, sort which represents the sort of the request/response from client/server, and the message itself (which can be empty string at times) NOTE: this class is Serializable to make it possible passing it thorught the stream between client and server
CSMessage(String, String, String) - Constructor for class myChat.CSMessage
regular constructor which used to create a instance of this class
